document_name: 6 MONTHS NO COST EXTENSION REQUEST SENT TO EU

outputs.output_descr: Broad-based participation will be strengthened, dialogue, trust- and consensus building enhanced and partnerships nurtured between civil society and local government actors. Policy driven efforts and enhanced networking opportunities for youth and non-governmental organizations will better link local entities to the national level.

project_descr: Addressed the underlying causes of conflict in Lebanon and created "safe spaces" for local identity groups to discuss their concerns openly and enhance mutual understanding of the different "other".
